mapper.select: select p.place_idx, p.title, p.new_address, p.old_address, p.subject_category, pf.file_name from places p left outer join place_files pf on (p.place_idx = pf.place_idx) order by p.place_idx limit #{param1}, #{param2}

select p.place_idx, p.title, p.old_address, p.new_address, p.phone, p.affiliation, p.subject_category, p.homepage, pf.file_name from places p left outer join place_files pf on (p.place_idx = pf.place_idx) where p.place_idx=#{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hgs.places (admin_idx,title, subject_category, affiliation, old_address, new_address, homepage, phone, openTime) VALUES (#{adminIdx},#{title},#{subjectCategory},#{affiliation},#{oldAddress},#{newAddress},#{homepage},#{phone})
